## ‚ùáÔ∏è Available in the Wizard! ü™Ñ‚ú®

<br>

This table is available through the Table Manager Wizard, which makes installation quick and easy!

### How to install:

1.  Open the **Table Manager**
2.  Click the **Add Table** button
3.  Select the **Wizard** tab
4.  Find and select this table from the dropdown menu: **`Starship Troopers VPW - SEGA (1997)`**
5.  Follow the on-screen instructions to download and upload the required files
6.  *"Would you like to know more?"*

<br>

Using the Wizard ensures you get the latest table version, have all required files (ROM, backglass, etc.), and have all the VPXS 4KP team's table tweaks and improvements!

<br>

__*We hope you enjoy!!*__

### üé¶ PuPpack (Backglass Videos/Music):

1.  Download the PuPpack `Starship Troopers (English) Pup Pack -- startrp2.zip` from [VP Universe](https://vpuniverse.com/files/file/16710-starship-troopers-english-pup-pack/) (by [PIPAllah](https://vpuniverse.com/profile/60727-pipallah/))
--- Note --- The PuP pack filename is the same as the ROM for this table. Be careful not to overwrite the ROM if you desire to hang on to it for later!
2.  Create the folder `pupvideos` within the `external/vpx-starshipvpw` folder in the Table Manager
3.  Extract the folder `startrp2` from the startrp2.zip PuP Package, and put it in the `pupvideos` folder so it looks like 'vpx-starshipvpw\pupvideos\startrp2'
4.  You should now have `external/vpx-starshipvpw/pupvideos/startrp2/{puppack files}`
5.  Unzip the `use_these_pup_files.zip` from the `external/vpx-starshipvpw` folder in the [repository](https://github.com/LegendsUnchained/vpx-standalone-alp4k/tree/main/external/vpx-starshipvpw)
6.  Place them inside the `pupvideos/startrp2` folder, and overwrite files if prompted.  **This is necessary otherwise it does not work**
7.  C'mon you apes, do you want to live forever?! Enjoy this amazing table with extra sounds and videos!
